name: StarNet Solutions
tagline: 100% custom and elite - branding + websites + more
description:
StarNet Solutions is the place to find help navigating the digital frontier. We are a full-service design and development house specializing in: logos & branding, custom web design and application development.
Our services include: ◊ Custom Facebook Applications and Fan Pages ◊ Mobile Phone Application Development (iPhone, Android) ◊ Development of Ecommerce Sites Including Merchant Services ◊ Search Engine Optimizing and Marketing ◊ Copy Writing, Proofreading, Editing ◊ Adobe Flash™ Animation, Programming, and Multimedia Streaming
